about.details:
Sabar Flex India Limited is a manufacturer and supplier of all kinds of Flexible packaging materials commonly used for packing Food, Dairy, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, Chemical & agriculture products etc. The company was incorporated in 2007 as a Partnership Firm.

The company's operations include manufacturing, processing, designing, buying, selling, exporting, and importing packing cases, cartons, drums, crates, cans, and containers, as well as wooden boxes, plastic containers, polythene containers, bottles, hollow wares, cases, drums, cages, tins, bins, jars, tubes, crates, packing cases, cans, bottles, vials, etc.

Sabar Flex India Limited has three manufacturing plants located in Gujarat.

Competitive Strengths :

  • Location Advantage
  • Strong management team and motivated and efficient work force
  • Quality Assurance
  • Research and Development capability

faqs.question: What is the Sabar Flex India IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sabar Flex India IPO is a SME IPO of 4070000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.48 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹11 per share. The minimum order quantity is 10000.

The IPO opens on September 8, 2022, and closes on September 13, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sabar Flex India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sabar Flex India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sabar Flex India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sabar Flex India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sabar Flex India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sabar Flex India IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sabar Flex India IPO opens on September 8, 2022 and closes on September 13, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sabar Flex India IPO?
faqs.answer: Sabar Flex India IPO lot size is 10000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sabar Flex India IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sabar Flex India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sabar Flex India IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sabar Flex India IPO will be done on Friday, September 16, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 20, 2022. Check the Sabar Flex India IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sabar Flex India IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sabar Flex India IPO listing date is on Wednesday, September 21, 2022.
